rule:
Each sentence in the paragraph must be wrapped within a

tag.
input: Coding enhances problem-solving skills. Algorithms optimize efficiency. Programs change the world.
evaluation:
```html

Coding enhances problem-solving skills. Coding is an essential skill for modern developers.

Algorithms optimize efficiency. Effective use of algorithms is crucial for efficiency in software development.

Programs change the world. Innovative programs have the power to transform society tremendously.

```
